casebody.data:
PHAETON AVIATION, INC., a North Carolina Corporation, Plaintiff,
v.
360 AVIATION, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company, and I.T. Source Corporation, a Nevada Limited Liability Company, Defendant. 360 Aviation, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company, Counterclaim Plaintiff,
v.
Jet Logistics, Inc., a North Carolina Corporation, Counterclaim Defendant. No. COA15-564. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. June 7, 2016.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
